name: An0m@ly (TRIDIUM)
description:
An0m@ly is a semi-classic RPG made with VX Ace RTP. Hey, it's my second game. 

This was more of a learning experience than an actual project. Part 2 will hopefully be better. 

Anyway, A young girl enlists in the Royal Guard only to have her life upturned by the arrival of strange entities known as An0m@lies.
